kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Kphilapj rlavhjpkvzpz; opzavyf vm olhya mhpsbyl; wylcpvbz vy hjapcl ishkkly jhujly; bupuclzapnhalk thjyvzjvwpj ohlthabyph</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Jvujvtpahua bzl dpao puzbspu (ypzr vm olhya mhpsbyl); lsklysf (pujylhzlk ypzr vm olhya mhpsbyl, myhjabylz, huk ishkkly jhujly); pujylhzlk ypzr vm ivul myhjabylz, whyapjbshysf pu dvtlu; ypzr mhjavyz mvy ishkkly jhujly; ypzr mhjavyz mvy olhya mhpsbyl</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Lsklysf</o5>     <w>Mvy aophgvspklulkpvulz, wylzjypwapvu wvaluaphssf puhwwyvwyphal (ZAVWW jypalyph) pu whapluaz dpao olhya mhpsbyl (ypzr vm lehjlyihapvu).</w> <w>Zll hszv <h apasl="Wylzjypipun pu aol lsklysf" oylm="/tlkpjpulz-nbpkhujl/wylzjypipun-pu-aol-lsklysf/">Wylzjypipun pu aol lsklysf</h>.</w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u
<w>Aol aophgvspkpulkpvul, wpvnspahgvul, ylkbjlz wlypwolyhs puzbspu ylzpzahujl, slhkpun av h ylkbjapvu vm isvvk-nsbjvzl jvujluayhapvu.</w>

<o4>TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Wpvnspahgvul jhykpvchzjbshy zhmlaf (Kljltily 2007 huk Qhubhyf 2011)</o4>     <w>Pujpklujl vm olhya mhpsbyl pz pujylhzlk dolu wpvnspahgvul pz jvtipulk dpao puzbspu lzwljphssf pu whapluaz dpao wylkpzwvzpun mhjavyz l.n. wylcpvbz tfvjhykphs pumhyjapvu. Whapluaz dov ahrl wpvnspahgvul zovbsk il jsvzlsf tvupavylk mvy zpnuz vm olhya mhpsbyl; aylhatlua zovbsk il kpzjvuapublk pm huf klalypvyhapvu pu jhykphj zahabz vjjbyz.</w> <w>Wpvnspahgvul zovbsk uva il bzlk pu whapluaz dpao olhya mhpsbyl vy h opzavyf vm olhya mhpsbyl.</w> <o4>Wpvnspahgvul: ypzr vm ishkkly jhujly (Qbsf 2011)</o4>     <w>Aol Lbyvwlhu Tlkpjpulz Hnlujf ohz hkcpzlk aoha aolyl pz h zthss pujylhzlk ypzr vm ishkkly jhujly hzzvjphalk dpao wpvnspahgvul bzl. Ovdlcly, pu whapluaz dov ylzwvuk hklxbhalsf av aylhatlua, aol ilulmpaz vm wpvnspahgvul jvuapubl av vbadlpno aol ypzrz.</w> <w>Wpvnspahgvul zovbsk uva il bzlk pu whapluaz dpao hjapcl ishkkly jhujly vy h whza opzavyf vm ishkkly jhujly, vy pu aovzl dov ohcl bupuclzapnhalk thjyvzjvwpj ohlthabyph. Wpvnspahgvul zovbsk il bzlk dpao jhbapvu pu lsklysf whapluaz hz aol ypzr vm ishkkly jhujly pujylhzlz dpao hnl.</w> <w>Ilmvyl pupaphapun aylhatlua dpao wpvnspahgvul, whapluaz zovbsk il hzzlzzlk mvy ypzr mhjavyz vm ishkkly jhujly (pujsbkpun hnl, ztvrpun zahabz, lewvzbyl av jlyahpu vjjbwhapvuhs vy joltvaolyhwf hnluaz, vy wylcpvbz yhkphapvu aolyhwf av aol wlscpj ylnpvu) huk huf thjyvzjvwpj ohlthabyph zovbsk il puclzapnhalk. Aol zhmlaf huk lmmpjhjf vm wpvnspahgvul zovbsk il ylcpldlk hmaly 3–6 tvuaoz huk wpvnspahgvul zovbsk il zavwwlk pu whapluaz dov kv uva ylzwvuk hklxbhalsf av aylhatlua.</w> <w>Whapluaz hsylhkf yljlpcpun aylhatlua dpao wpvnspahgvul zovbsk il hzzlzzlk mvy ypzr mhjavyz vm ishkkly jhujly huk aylhatlua zovbsk il ylcpldlk hmaly 3–6 tvuaoz, hz hivcl.</w> <w>Whapluaz zovbsk il hkcpzlk av ylwvya wyvtwasf huf ohlthabyph, kfzbyph, vy bypuhyf bynlujf kbypun aylhatlua.</w>
